it.polimi.se2018.server.controller

Class GameSetup

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.server.controller.GameSetup

  • class GameSetup
extends java.lang.Object
    Class GameSetup: representation of the first part of the game. It handles to load, to shuffle and to deliver all the cards to the selected virtual view
    Author:
    fadda-miceli-mundo

    • Field Summary

      private static int VALUE 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameSetup(GameController gameController)
      Class constructor: create the final step of a game delivering all the cards(publics, private, tool card)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void changeBagger()
      helper method used to change the player responsible of drafting the die from the bag and roll the dice
      (package private) java.util.List<PatternCard> loadPatternCard()
      method that loads all the 24 pattern cards
      private java.util.List<PrivateObjectiveCard> loadPrivate()
      method that loads and shuffles all the private cards
      private java.util.List<PublicObjectiveCard> loadPublic()
      method that loads and shuffles all the public cards
      private java.util.List<ToolCard> loadToolCard()
      method that loads and shuffles all the tool cards
      private int ricorsiveMethod(int a)
      helper recursive method used to check that the pattern card distributed to the player are not the same
      (package private) void setPrivateCardModel(VirtualView view)
      method that delivers one private card to the virtual view if the mode is multi player, otherwise the method delivers three private cards
      (package private) void setPublicCardModel()
      method that delivers three public cards if the mode is multi player, otherwise the method delivers two public cards
      (package private) java.util.List<ToolCard> setToolCard()
      method that delivers three tool cards if the mode is multi player, otherwise the method delivers tool cards as much as the difficulty chosen by the player
      (package private) void startPatternCard(VirtualView view)
      method that delivers to the virtual view four pattern cards

        list of the tool cards delivered
